item.title: [DISTRELEC-4208] LT - not able to pay with credit card
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041

TEST

https://test.distrelec.lt/checkout/payment
https://test.distrelec.lt/checkout/payment/unknownerror

Log in as user distrelec.testing+29@gmail.com, pw: distrelec. Put some articles in the cart, click through checkout, choose credit card as payment option, at pyement page enter credit cart data, card no: 471110000000000, cvc: 684, exp. date: 06/24, Name: Hans Muster, then click on ok. This open a distrelec page with an unknown error. (img_135/136_lt_pzu)
item.summary: LT - not able to pay with credit card

comments.comment:
There was a problem with the deployment to Q.

It should now work.
It works, confirmation page with order number opens.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4188] Save the result of the order calculation on the cart
item.description: save the response of the order calculation web service for debugging purpose.
item.summary: Save the result of the order calculation on the cart

comments.comment:
With this property this functionality can be activated or deactivated:

distrelec.order.calculation.serializeResponse=false/true

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4185] Integrate latest translated properties
item.description: Please integrate the translated properties into the proeperty files for Q and P.

comments.comment: integration done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4182] OrderHistory Converter Exception
item.description:
Hello

In the SapReadOrderResponseOrderHistoryConverter class we have this code : 

/** Payment */
if (readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode() != null) {
	// Setting payment mode and payment info NEED TO DISSCUSS Payment information coming from response
	try {
		final MovexPaymentModeModel distPaymentMode = (MovexPaymentModeModel) paymentOptionService
				.getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode());
		distOrderData.setPaymentMode(getDefaultDistPaymentModeConverter().convert(distPaymentMode));
	} catch (final Exception e) {
		LOG.warn(e.getMessage(), e);
	}
}

For all orders of my customer the distPaymentMode is always empty (""), in this case should we removed this code?

comments.comment: I am not sure that we should remove or disable this code for ever. We need to insure that always empty distPaymentMode is right ? i think it should have some value in the response. Please check with Francesco.

Yes, maybe we can test the value like this?

if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode())) {

Yes would be nice to add this check i thought 

paymentOptionService.getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode();

Might has placed all the checks but any ways to put and extra check doesn't cost anything. Also I would suggest you to open a new jira task and assign it to
Evangelos attach the request and response xml and ask him the reason why we have emptyString in distPaymentMode . Will be nice to double check if sap has some issue in that case.

We can close this bug after apply this check and open a new jira.

Hello

Test added. I have asked Evangelos who will investigate for the empty field.

Thank you Neeraj

You are welcome ☺

Neeraj Shandilya
Developer (E-Platform)
Elfa Distrelec
SE-175 80 Järfälla / Sweden
Tel. +46727659287(H)

From: Laurent Zamofing | Distrelec (JIRA) AutoMailer@namics.com
Sent: 23 May 2014 14:02
To: Shandilya, Neeraj
Subject: [jira.namics] (DISTRELEC-4182) OrderHistory Converter Exception

https://jira.namics.com/s/en_US-sjbl1-418945332/854/85/_/jira-logo-scaled.png

https://jira.namics.com/secure/useravatar?avatarId=10462Laurent Zamofing | Distrelec<https://jira.namics.com/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=lzamofing> commented on [Bug] DISTRELEC-4182<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4182>
OrderHistory Converter Exception<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4182>

Hello

Test added. I have asked Evangelos who will investigate for the empty field.

Thank you Neeraj

This message is automatically generated by JIRA.
If you think it was sent incorrectly, please contact your JIRA administrators
For more information on JIRA, see: http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira

Hello Neeraj

Since Evangelos resolved the SAP issue, we have a distPaymentMode but I had to change a little bit the code to this :

/** Payment */
if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode())) {
  // Setting payment mode and payment info NEED TO DISSCUSS Payment information coming from response
  try {
    final DistPaymentModeModel distPaymentMode = (DistPaymentModeModel) paymentOptionService
  	.getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode());
    distOrderData.setPaymentMode(getDefaultDistPaymentModeConverter().convert(distPaymentMode));
  } catch (final Exception e) {
    LOG.warn(e.getMessage(), e);
  }
}

Does you agree with this modification?
Now I can see in the order detail the name of the delivery option but not the payment option...

Yes Completely Agree.

Now you can remove this TODO comment

Thank you so much.
Done. Now we can see the delivery and payment method in the order history

Now the payment methode is missing in the order history.
User: distrelec.testing+lt1@gmail.com

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4179] Payment terms
item.description: Payment terms for customers should be selected from zcustdata table based on the sales org. B2C customer sales org is 540 and for B2B customers is 541. The field SD_ZTERM should be selected. The customer creation interface should work as the zcust program is working and creates the customers with the same logic

comments.comment:
Hi Evangelos,

Please test again. It seems that '1' was added for B2C, not for B2B.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Please close if fixed.
Thx.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4178] Indipendent logging of each CXF soap web services and operations
item.description:
The webshop platform executes a lot of webservice calls especially for FactFinder Integration and SAP Integration.

CXF standard logging can be activated only globally, and this is not ok for production environment.

We want to have the possibility to enable the logging on Service and Operation level.
item.summary: Indipendent logging of each CXF soap web services and operations

comments.comment:
I've implemented two classes

  • DistLoggingInInterceptor
  • DistLoggingOutInterceptor

We can configure the logging with this property:

com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.cxf.interceptors.DistLoggingInInterceptor.WHITE_LIST

If no configuration is provided, than NO logging is performed.

This property contains the list of services and operations allowed to log the xml payload.
The configuration must follow this pattern

Service Namespace URI 1;Service Operation 1,Service Operation 2|Service Namespace URI 2;Service Operation 1|...;...

There is the possibility to activate the logging for ALL services or operation with the following value: 

_ALL_

Examples:

http://ws69.webservice.adapters.factfinder.de;getProductCampaigns,logInformation|http://www.distrelec.com/hybris;_ALL_

This activate the logging for all SAP webservices and the logging of getProductCampaigns for fact finder.

The spring configuration for these CXF interceptor is something like this:

<bean id="logInbound" class="com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.cxf.interceptors.DistLoggingInInterceptor">
	<property name="configuration" value="#{configurationService.getConfiguration()}" />
</bean>
<bean id="logOutbound" class="com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.cxf.interceptors.DistLoggingOutInterceptor">
	<property name="configuration" value="#{configurationService.getConfiguration()}" />
</bean> 

<cxf:bus>
	<cxf:inInterceptors>
		<ref bean="logInbound"/>
	</cxf:inInterceptors>
	<cxf:outInterceptors>
		<ref bean="logOutbound"/>
	</cxf:outInterceptors>
	<cxf:outFaultInterceptors>
		<ref bean="logOutbound"/>
	</cxf:outFaultInterceptors>
		<cxf:inFaultInterceptors>
	<ref bean="logInbound"/>
	</cxf:inFaultInterceptors>
</cxf:bus>

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4177] CH: Sub-User cannot complete checkout
item.description:
• login with user distrelec.testing+guest2@gmail.com / distrelec
  • this is a sub-user to schweiz_test
  • start the checkout process
  • order review page doesn't load

comments.comment:
Husi found out the following:

  • date of the user's budget was 7. january, so it wasn't valid anymore
  • he removed the budget
  • now the order can be placed

=> creation of budget upon sub-user creation must be analyzed, possibly has an error

Can we close this?
Do we need another ticket for the analysis?
other ticket created. closing this one.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4176] CH: Sub-User -> changes to any user settings are not saved
item.description:
• login with schweiz_test
  • open any sub-user
  • edit any field
  • save it. you get back to the user list with a success message
  • open the edited sub-user again: the changes were not saved.
item.summary: CH: Sub-User -> changes to any user settings are not saved

comments.comment: Ok now?
Yes, for most fields it is ok. However it is (still) not possible to create a new budget of any kind on a sub-user. Creating separate ticket für that, closing this one.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4166] Cannot pay with credit card
item.description:
TS Workflow:

make two order with different credit cards and check if the credit cards are visible in the payment options

Result:
did not work. see attachment

comments.comment: Seems to happen with any user, error 500 in the iFrame.

Send cart/order code (from hybris) instead of SAP order code. SAP order code will be generated later during order placement.

To be able to track payment we should send the hybris cart/order code to SAP. I have created a ticket for this.DISTRELEC-4194

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4162] LT - return of articles doesn't work
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041
TS-24.86

Log in: distrelec.testing+lt8@gmail.com, pw: distrelec. Go to order management, open an order detail page, click on return, fill out the form but the articles will not returned becuase there is no option selectable. (img_106/107_lt_pzu)
item.summary: LT - return of articles doesn't work

comments.comment:
Francesco, please remove the RMA link from the order history.
If not possible assign it back to me.
Thank you.

Hi

We add the returnReqReasonList and returnReqPackagingList only in Movex case:

if (DistErpSystem.MOVEX.getCode().equals(getStoreSessionFacade().getCurrentSalesOrg().getErpSystem())) {
  final List<DistRMAReasonData> returnReqReasonList = Converters.convertAll(rmaService.getAllReturnRequestReason(), distRMAReasonConverter);
  model.addAttribute("returnReqReasonList", returnReqReasonList);

  final List<DistRMAPackagingData> returnReqPackagingList = Converters.convertAll(rmaService.getAllReturnRequestPackaging(),
	distRMAPackagingConverter);
  model.addAttribute("returnReqPackagingList", returnReqPackagingList);
}

The link in the order detail page is only visible only in Movex case:

<%-- The return request link should not be visible for SAP --%>
<c:if test="${currentSalesOrg.erpSystem eq 'MOVEX' && (orderData.status.code == 'ERP_STATUS_SHIPPED' || orderData.status.code == 'ERP_STATUS_RECIEVED')}">
  <p>
    <a href="#"
      data-order-code="${orderData.code}"
      data-order-date="<fmt:formatDate value='${orderData.orderDate}' pattern='${date_pattern}' />"
      data-product-code="${product.code}"
      data-entry-quantity="${orderEntry.quantity}"
      class="link-return"><spring:message code="cart.list.return" />
    </a>
  </p>
</c:if>

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4146] Error 500 before step 3 during check out
item.description:
Node 1
12:49

User: distrelec.testing+lt1@gmail.com

1. On Step 2
2. additional shipping address is selected
3. change to pick up
4. change to billing address = shipping address
5. click on continue
5. Error 500
item.summary: Error 500 before step 3 during check out

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4033] LT shop - wrong article code in mail sent to customer about quotation request.
item.description:
See attached pdf.
Wrong article code is picked up.
item.summary: LT shop - wrong article code in mail sent to customer about quotation request.

comments.comment:
Jean,
which article did you request the quotation for?

Got it now:
instead of the new sap item number (8 digits), the elfa number (7 digits) should be transmitted.

Done.

I have changed the email-quoteProductPriceBody.vm file to use the codeErpRelevant for SAP :

Article Number: #if(${ctx.movex})${ctx.product.name}#else${ctx.product.codeErpRelevant}#end <br/>

I have also create the new folder for the release v2.0.m7 and add information for the post installation.

@Laurent: The code above is not correct! First of all you give the product name instead of the product code in case of Movex. Second the attribute codeErpRelevant is exactly doing what you need, it delivers the code based on the ERP related to the current web shop. So just have to use this attribute. There is not further logic needed.
So please come by on Monday. I can show you how you can fix that.
Almots ok. Code is correct but we have ${} that have to be removed.

Done. I have also add the request in post installation.

Article Number: #if(${ctx.product.codeErpRelevant})${ctx.product.codeErpRelevant}#else - #end <br/>

attachment.name: ELFA - LT - price and quantity request - wrong article code.pdf
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1634] Check for duplicate user names
item.description:
Please check if there are user in all shop systems, that have probably the same user name. For Movex and Navision shops there are no duplicated users, because this to system depending both on the iShop.
So we just have to check, if a user name in the ELFA SAP also exists in the iShop DB. It should not, because the ELFA SAP generates the user name. (it's an ID) But please verify!

comments.comment:
Hi Nabil

Could you please compare the customer iShop usernames with the Elfa usernames together with Neeraj?
thx.

The ELFA SAP customer usernames are numeric values ( the customer number ). We have around 1363 numeric usernames in the ishop DB. An export of all these usernames was already sent to Neeraj to check if there are some duplicate usernames.
Attached File have a column which marks the username those who are dupicate in Elfa R3 system

@Nando: What do you expect from my side?
From my point of view, business (Oana/Florian) have to decide what to do with these (around 100, as of Jan 2014) users that exist with exactly the same name in hybris (migrated from iShop) and in ELFA SAP.
I see two options:
a) we will NOT migrate them from ELFA SAP to hybris
b) we have to change the existing accounts in hybris and give them a new login (e.g. their e-mail address). Or we send them an email and ask them to change their login themselves

(I don't know that Oana's last Excel "Duplicate_ELFA_cleaned.xlsx" sheet can be used for?)

I don't know either.
But I agree, business should decide what action needs to be taken.
I linked this issue to DISTRELEC-3632 as it concerns the ELFA user migration.

Dear all,

my proposal is teh follwoing:

  • for all the duplicates at ELFA, we should chnage the username into the e-mail address.
  • I will take this task further.

duplicates that do not have an e-mail address should be deleted

duplicates that ahve an e-mail address, the username should be changed to the e-mail address

Hi Oana,

On this task as you can see we have identifed the duplicate users. We retrive all other information i.e. name, emailadress and country.

And as per nabil our next step is to change the username of these duplicate user with there email address.

I have a question here before we start doing so, I checked the above list and found that none of the user mentioned in the list is from Lithuania.

So do we really need to change there login name at this point of time ?

Hi Neeraj!

I do not have a clear tasks list of what is happending in this migration.

Maybe you can provide one. Which data, for which countries will be moved from which site to which site.

thanks!

as per Florian we only have 3 duplicate users in LT, which were all the very same customer. Do you agree?
